title: ?Looking for your first position in the electronics field (××©×¨× 29482)
description:
NESS is looking for a Mechanical\ Electric\ Electronic practical engineer to join a leading project in the industry.
The position includes: providing an initial solution to technical malfunctions, working with complex and integrated equipment, software operation, hardware testing and analysis runs.
Also includes using advanced equipment such as Scope, Spectrum Analyzer and more.
Full time position, in Haifa.

Mechanical\ Electric\ Electronics practical engineer - A must.
Technical experience in hardware - A must.
Experience as a technician working with complex systems (including military experience) - A must.
High-level English - A must.
